=======
s3qlite
=======


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/s3qlite.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/s3qlite

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/benmusch/s3qlite.svg

.. image:: https://pyup.io/repos/github/benmusch/s3qlite/shield.svg
     :target: https://pyup.io/repos/github/benmusch/s3qlite/
     :alt: Updates


un queries across multiple sqlite files stored on s3 (or an s3-API-compliant-service)


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://s3qlite.readthedocs.io.
